column1: The best part about presiding over the House Floor is starting your day with the Pledge of Allegiance in our Nation’s Capitol. https://t.co/rXamoTvk1W

For years President Trump and his Administration have played fast and loose with the law but the law has finally caught up with them.   I am overjoyed and urge DACA recipients to take advantage of this opportunity and explore applying or renewing your status. https://t.co/X5HVy06teX

For 245 years the @USMC has displayed a true commitment to our country in every conflict our nation has faced. From the shores of the Bahamas to the mountains of Afghanistan Marines have always stayed true to themselves & to each other. Happy Birthday Marines & Semper Fidelis. https://t.co/LmYixQWX7A

In the middle of a pandemic the Trump Administration is going before the Supreme Court and attempting to dismantle the ACA.  If they are successful millions of Americans could lose their health coverage.  We must #ProtectOurCare! https://t.co/IA8TDUmgSL

SCOTUS just ended the #2020Census early.  @realDonaldTrump’s obsession with stopping the census will have lasting effects for years to come.   Countless communities will be denied the federal funds needed to recover from the COVID-19 pandemic.  This will hurt a lot of people.
Happy 245th birthday to the @USNavy! https://t.co/J8PF2nJa6Q
Today deported vets can return to the USA to be laid to rest at a national cemetery. Let’s fix this. https://t.co/W6uSM9RAiS

I’m shocked the President would abandon the American people in this time of crisis by ending #COVID19 relief negotiations.  210000 are dead. Families are suffering. Millions are unemployed. Rent is due.   The President can end this suffering. Why wait? https://t.co/lEOKKjRZ8h

I wish the President and First Lady a speedy and safe recovery.  This virus continues to be a threat we should all take seriously.  Remember to wear a mask wash your hands and continue practicing social distancing.  Together we can beat #COVID19.

Proud to join @RepJayapal and my colleagues in making sure that we fully investigate the allegations of medical abuses suffered by immigrants at the Irwin County ICE Detention Center. https://t.co/dQSLSrSmBG

Working-class families in our community have been hit hard by the COVID-19 pandemic.  These families need help now. This legislation will help struggling families survive.  The Senate must immediately take up this bill. My constituents cannot wait any longer. https://t.co/Zm9m7LM9m4

🚨ORANGE COUNTY🚨 We are only days away from the end of the #2020Census.   Help our community. Take the census and shape our future now:  ☎️Call 844-330-2020 ✉️Mail your paper questionnaire 💻Visit https://t.co/DclssK73eo

The future of the music and entertainment we love so much depends on reforming our copyright laws.  Today I asked industry experts and artists what they think we can do to protect their work and improve the marketplace. https://t.co/on6HOicslw

This is devastating news for our community.  What’s worse is the pain and hardship before these 28000 Americans was avoidable.  For 138 days the Heroes Act has sat on @senatemajldr desk.  How many people have to lose their jobs before we get a vote? https://t.co/NTWt7iNdxH

Republicans & Democrats agree—the peaceful transition of power is fundamental to our democracy.   The House just passed a resolution by a vote of 397 to 5 affirming our commitment to this core principle.  We urge @realDonaldTrump to join us. https://t.co/pVncrWTV2c
G'mar chatima tova.  To everyone observing Yom Kippur I wish you an easy fast.
Irwin Co ICE authorities deny Members of US Congress cell phones in facility.
Arriving at Irwin County Detention Center’s ICE holding facility on fact finding visit. https://t.co/OHUrZo7JVA

Growing up I put my hand on my heart just like the other kids but America always reminded me I was different.  When Hollywood lacks diversity it tells young Latinos they don’t have a place in America.  We can’t wait another decade. We need #MoreLatinosInHollywood now. https://t.co/6tuUD4lOdI

Two weeks ago I urged @SenRonJohnson to ask @DHS_Wolf to affirm at his confirmation hearing that neither he nor @DHSgov will interfere in the 2020 election on the President’s behalf.  With the election weeks away we need to know where @DHS_Wolf stands.  https://t.co/zZSb5tibW7

Congress is taking action against China’s continued assault on the Uyghur people.  The Uyghur Forced Labor Prevention Act places strong economic sanctions on companies profiting from forced Chinese labor.  We must stand up to China’s deplorable treatment of its citizens.
She gave us everything.   Rest In Peace your honor. https://t.co/dmGDbF1PV6
Wishing a healthy happy & sweet new year to all celebrating Rosh Hashanah  Shana tovah u’metukah – may you have a joyous and sweet new year.

I’ve been saying it for years. Addressing white supremacy is a grave matter of national security.   The USA must immediately begin dealing with domestic terror threats or I fear we will one day wake up to a homegrown 9/11. https://t.co/JLYhq8mj3F

Wolf is failing to protect Americans & is using @DHSgov to enact the President's most heinous ideas. With multiple whistleblowers exposing everything from fabricated intelligence reports to alleged ACTS OF GENOCIDE we must hear from Mr. Wolf!

This morning @DHS_Wolf ignored a subpoena & failed to appear before the House Homeland Security Committee. Instead of investigating VP Biden over fabricated claims made by Russian spies @SenRonJohnson should immediately hold a confirmation hearing for Secretary-Nominee Wolf.

Sexual assault is a blight on our military. We owe it to every servicemember to eradicate this dishonorable & heinous act from within the ranks.  I’m proud to join @RepSpeier & @RepSylviaGarcia in introducing the #IAmVanessaGuillén Act.  Let’s end military sexual assault. https://t.co/x6uQiRedS2

I joined 173 of my colleagues in demanding an investigation into the unconscionable treatment of detainees in ICE custody. @DHSgov must immediately investigate these allegations.  The severity of forced sterilization cannot be overstated. We need immediate answers. https://t.co/y8wkW8pkX8

Today marks the beginning of #HispanicHeritageMonth!  This is the time each year when we recognize the unique contributions of Latino & Hispanic Americans to our great nation.  Stay tuned throughout the month as we share stories of important figures in our community.

Airman Jason Phan bravely volunteered to go into harm’s way & defend our nation. This young man’s courage & commitment to his country are an inspiration to us all. My deepest condolences to Jason’s family in this difficult time.  Learn more about Jason 👉🏽 https://t.co/Cp5kqIuxYH

Numerous women held in @ICEgov custody have reported being subjected to forced sterilization without their consent or prior knowledge.   This is abhorrent. These claims must be immediately investigated by the @DHSgov Inspector General. https://t.co/Hf2wJZDBfz
We’re back in DC and ready to get to work!  Tune in at 10AM ET for my first hearing of the week.  Learn more about the legislation we’re working on: https://t.co/kLXbTLMNMS https://t.co/zVPBtUg5n2

I am devastated by the news that two @LASDHQ Deputies were ambushed and shot by an armed assailant. The perpetrator will be found and held accountable.   We must all raise our voices to condemn this heinous act and urge peace.

The peaceful transition of power is the cornerstone of our democracy.   I sent a letter to @SenRonJohnson urging him to ask @DHS_Wolf to confirm he will respect the election results and not permit federal agents to intervene on the President’s behalf. https://t.co/pDiI45qttC

Today is 19th Anniversary of 911 marking the cowardly attack on our nation.  We are reminded that we must always be vigilant.  And we are reminded to be ready to protect or democracy from foreign cyber attacks as well.

Right now more than half of Americans have legal access to Cannabis. It’s time our federal laws represented this reality.  Tune in today for an in-depth conversation on why cannabis legalization is vital to reforming our justice system.  📺 12:40ET 👉🏽 https://t.co/RxrBItbEkx https://t.co/9jPjHzE6Yd

Anaheim Orange Garden Grove & Santa Ana have been awarded $14560520 in Community Development Block Grants I fought to include in the CARES Act!  This funding helps provide affordable housing & keep our vulnerable neighbors in their homes.
Every vote will count this November. Every vote has to be earned. https://t.co/71PUMK1e8c

Neighbors helping neighbors during Covid 19: https://t.co/EUO7tmsy19

I’ve been to Belleau Wood and Aisne-Marne American Cemetery. I’ve laid wreaths on their tombs and heard the stories of their bravery.   These men are heroes who marched into certain death for their nation. They deserve our respect and honor.  👉🏽 https://t.co/mF3Thy6A8I

It's September which means that the deadline for completing the #2020Census is THIS MONTH.  Go to https://t.co/7ysHcMwrz2 BEFORE September 30 to #GetCounted.  Your responses will help determine representation in Congress & how federal 💰 will support critical local programs.

We are 62 days from the general election and @DHSgov is withholding vital intelligence on foreign interference.  I sent a letter to @DHS_Wolf asking why he’s hiding evidence of a Russian misinformation campaign against VP Biden.  We need answers now! https://t.co/JS4rpXpoNl

There is new evidence that Russia is actively spreading disinformation about Biden and @DHS_Wolf blocked an intel report to cover it up.   Russia is interfering in the 2020 election and the President’s allies in Washington are letting them get away with it. https://t.co/7vyqQMyp0S

📥📥 Poll workers help countless voters each year and make our democracy work!  Interested in volunteering to be a poll worker?   💻📱Visit https://t.co/VkN4gWy3Bb on and sign up to be a poll worker.  #NationalPollWorkerRecruitmentDay

I’m pleased to announce Children's Hospital of Orange County has been awarded a $1102794 federal grant to help train future doctors!   This critical money will help @chocchildrens continue to protect children and save lives in our community.

COVID-19 claimed another victim on Main Street in #Anaheim.  After 16 years of serving our community & training the #USA Olympic volleyball team American Sports Centers is closing their doors.  We must do more to help our struggling job creators & the people that depend on them.

This #WomensEqualityDay marks the 100th anniversary of the 19th Amendment!   Generations of women fought to secure the right to vote and create an equal world.   Let’s remember the hard work done by so many to create a freer and fairer society for us all.

I led my colleagues in condemning @DHSgov for its continued war on legal immigrants.  @USCIS has raised fees for legal immigrants 41% since 2016 & @DHS_Wolf just created a new fee for asylum-seekers while eliminating low-income fee waivers.  This rule must be rescinded! https://t.co/QsEMWq1Qur
I’m in DC this Saturday with my colleague Debbi Dingle voting to save our US Post Office and secure our vote by mail this November. https://t.co/4ojvPp5yKq
At Anaheim High School Waste Not OC’s Mike Learakos rolls out a solar powered Fridge to assure our food security.   Great  job Mike.  Let’s get busy https://t.co/4Xj8Us8Pmx

The #USPS delivers medicine for seniors transports packages for small businesses provides financial services for rural communities and much more.   We must protect this critical institution.   👉🏽 https://t.co/LJLuGyjeVf
Families are suffering.  Small businesses are closing.   Pass the #HeroesAct. https://t.co/bGaNSHjc7G

President Trump just confirmed what many of us have suspected all along. He is defunding the US Post Office to prevent Americans from voting by mail this November.   All Americans have the right to vote without risking exposure to COVID-19. https://t.co/XbkcbsO0YR
The White House is already walking back the President’s COVID-19 executive orders.   Empty promises help no one.  Pass the #HeroesAct. https://t.co/JAu5cAkvbp
Congress passed the Heroes Act Covid - 19 assistance months ago.  It sits in the Senate. Let’s get it done.  Our small businesses are dying.  These jobs are not coming  back. https://t.co/PYJ0HXKugc

Four million children in California depend on their schools for free and low-cost meals.  I joined my colleagues in urging the @USDA to protect students and ensure schools can continue feeding children throughout the pandemic. https://t.co/wTHpqWX6NZ

I sent a letter with 22 of my colleagues urging Speaker Pelosi to protect funding in the #HeroesAct for medical schools that serve diverse and underserved communities.  COVID-19 is devastating minority communities. We need doctors to fight back! https://t.co/XjJl2XywGo
Checking in on our forgotten heroes our frontline farm workers that continue working during Covid-19. https://t.co/1awOmZ7Rdy
Providing PPE to our frontline farm workers that are continuing to feed our families during  Covid-19. https://t.co/dOz9dWKsZS

One year ago 23 people were targeted & murdered in El Paso Texas. Latino families were gunned down in a senseless and racially motivated attack by a self-described white supremacist.   Today we mourn those lost & recommit to defending our communities against hate.

Glad @repblumenauer’s amendment to protect legal state run cannabis programs from federal overreach passed.   The American people largely support cannabis reforms. It’s time the federal government got with the program.   Thank you Earl for leading the charge for reform. https://t.co/W1nCYgH3IM

After many years of hardwork bipartisan legislation I cosponsored to create a Latino Smithsonian Museum has passed the House!  Millions of Americans visit the National Mall annually. Now theyll have the opportunity to learn about our nation & the contribution of Latino Americans.

Presidential pardons are intended to give clemency and compassion not to excuse partisan political crimes.   @HouseJudiciary voted to pass HR 7695 the Abuse of Power Prevention Act to ensure no president can commit a crime and pardon themselves.  No one is above the law!

.@HouseJudiciary just passed HR 2678 to prevent a criminal president from using their power to hide from the accountability.   This bill ensures the DOJ can indict even when they would be otherwise barred by the statute of limitations.  No one is above the law!
✅ The Moving Forward Act - Invests $1.5 trillion to rebuild our crumbling infrastructure and create good-paying jobs in our communities.

✅ The CARES Act - Provided families with cash payments created $600 unemployment insurance; ✅ The Heroes Act - Puts up to $6000 in the pockets of families extends the $600 unemployment insurance and invests a trillion dollars into communities;
Families are struggling. That's why I'm hard at work fighting for our community in Washington. We've passed:

18 million Americans are out of work & expanded unemployment benefits expire July 31. The House passed the Heroes Act to extend these benefits to 2021 in May!  Tragically the President & Senate can’t agree on how to help Americans. Pass the #HeroesAct now. Americans can’t wait. https://t.co/XoHzIBPtD8

The #NOBANAct ensures no president will ever be able to single out any race or religion again.   We are a nation of immigrants & our future depends on the innovative ideas & boundless passion of new Americans.   This bill ensures we remain a shining city on a hill for the world.

Healthcare professionals schools and small businesses around the country are in vital need of masks gloves and gowns right now.   I asked FEMA’s director when Americans can expect the USA to have enough PPE. His response: “I’m not telling you that.” https://t.co/SIr8FBO2ts

I took action to avoid this disaster and extend the deadline in May!   The Senate must pass the #HeroesAct immediately and extend unemployment benefits until January 2021.

If you lost your job because of the coronavirus pandemic you know how critical the extra $600 in federal unemployment is for you and your family.   Unfortunately this vital safety net is about to end because of the Senate's inaction.
It is time Senator McConnell passed the Heroes Act. Families can't wait any longer!

✅ Dedicates $1 trillion in local and state communities to fund health care workers public safety workers and others vital to our communities; ✅ Invests $75 billion in testing tracing and treatment resources needed to reopen safely.

✅ Put up to $6000 per household in the pockets of struggling families and extends $600 unemployment payments until January 2021; ✅ Strengthens the Paycheck Protection Program so more small business can get the money they need to stay in business;
The President and his Senate allies are finally considering helping families struggling to get by during this pandemic.   Lucky for them the House passed the #HeroesAct in May! It will:
Although John's presence will be missed in the halls of Congress we know the work is not done and his legacy will live on in the generations of Americans he has inspired.

...in our streets through peaceful protest to fight for equal justice under the law. This year we saw generations of Americans carry on that legacy in our streets through peaceful protest to fight for equal justice under the law.

...when we see that something is not right. It is on all of us to live up to John's legacy—to get in the way and to get in good necessary trouble using the discipline of nonviolence to move America forward. This year we saw generations of Americans carry on that legacy...

Congressman John Lewis is an American icon the Congress's conscience & a fighter for a more equitable just & free society. He demonstrated that while being on the right side of history is not easy & can be dangerous it is our moral obligation to stand up & to speak out...

While COVID-19 rages across the USA President Trump has:  ❌ Ended government-funded testing sites ❌ Denied critical science & repeated misinformation ❌ Filed to terminate the ACA permanently.  As usual the Administration is picking politics over solving the crisis upon us.

Today we took a big step in protecting our streets by passing the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act. This bill is a comprehensive answer to police reform that will rebuild trust in our communities. The tragic death of George Floyd will not be in vain. https://t.co/jItVxecblI

The United States continues to redefine what’s possible because American businesses recruit brilliant minds from all around the globe.   Immigrants bring innovations and ideas we can’t begin to imagine. Banning skilled immigrant workers only does one thing—hurts American.

While many of us sit at home these hardworking immigrants are still at work in our hospitals our fields and countless other industries. The coronavirus doesn’t care about a person’s wealth job or immigration status.

I just introduced the Leave No Taxpayer Behind Act because taxpaying immigrants were left out of the $2 trillion coronavirus relief bill. These taxpayers work in critical sectors of our economy like agriculture & contribute greatly to our country.

Farmworkers fill our markets & dinner tables. They are essential to our economy & our nation.  Yet these taxpayers have been intentionally excluded from coronavirus relief efforts.  We depend on their work to feed our families. I won’t stop fighting until they are treated equally https://t.co/4pUV3kIiRO
